name: FeitElectric
0:
”Alexa, turn on bedroom light”
”Alexa, set bedroom light to blue”
”Alexa, dim bedroom light”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Use Alexa to control your Feit Electric products. After connecting Alexa to your products in a few simple steps:
1. Download our "Feit Electric" app in app market, then register an account (or log in directly if you already have an account);
2. Configure our devices in "Feit Electric" app and change appropriate name for your devices;
3. Enable "Feit Electric" skill on Alexa app, you'll be navigated to the login page, follow the instructions on the page to complete linking;
4. Tell Echo "Alexa, discover my devices". Wait for Echo to say "Search complete";
5. Now all setup is finished. You can enjoy the voice control on your home devices like these:
* Alexa, turn on my livingroom light.
* Alexa, turn off my livingroom light.
* Alexa, dim my livingroom light.
* Alexa, brighten my livingroom light.
* Alexa, set the livingroom light to 20 percent.
* Alexa, set bedroom light to green.
* Alexa, set bedroom light to daylight. 

If you have any problems, please contact us at info@feit.com
